title: Just Add Water?
description: H2O Water Activated Light USA -  Canada -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
transcript: What's up guys Lou here back with another video and one of the missions here on Unbox Therapy is to incover... Incover? What the... *laughs* Incover! The unusual realm of strange gadgets that exist things like this that are on Amazon and you really you look at them and you wonder is that thing, is that for real? Does that, does it work? What is this about? This is called the BlackoutBuddy Kind of a weird name *laughs* Anyway, you get it Always ready, water activated emergency light - what?! The water powers... the flashlight? How?! Don't ask me how it works, ok? But apparently a few drops gives you up to 72 hours of flashlight Uh, let's see here eco-friendly. Yeah, of course, uses water. For light whenever and wherever you need it, it works with a few drops of liquid Okay, that's what it looks like, so... Remove tab to add liquid, there's a little plastic covering on the bottom here I've got some water Convenient water There's like this little... kinda grill at the top over here Let's uh, I don't know. Let's pour a little water in here Now what happens? Do I do a little more? Few drops of water you say... Okay, it's absorbing in there now. Get the water on the table. Maybe it takes a moment? Where's that liquid going by the way? Is there like a sponge or something in there? Oh! Jack! Huh! Wow... That's too cool! You see that?! You can see that there, yeah... Should we kill a couple lights, Jack? Hello! It's working! It's like, it almost appears to be getting brighter as I leave it here Now, you have some water on the table, as you can tell Something's going on here I can hear it! *sparkling sounds* Wow, very cool There you have it guys. The H2O Buddy - yeah, it works! Look how small the keyboard is! What am I... Oh man...
